mapper.update: update contr_services_cap set co_id = #{coId}, sncode = #{sncode}, seqno = #{seqno}, seqno_pre = #{seqnoPre}, bccode = #{bccode}, pending_bccode = #{pendingBccode}, dn_id = #{dnId}, dn_block_id = #{dnBlockId}, main_dirnum = #{mainDirnum}, cs_status = #{csStatus}, cs_activ_date = #{csActivDate}, cs_deactiv_date = #{csDeactivDate}, cs_request = #{csRequest}, rec_version = #{recVersion}, public_number_dn_id = #{publicNumberDnId}, vpn_id = #{vpnId}, public_block_id = #{publicBlockId}, profile_id = #{profileId}, dn_shown_in_bill = #{dnShownInBill}, request_id = #{requestId} where co_id = #{coId};
